habitat_description:
This species is found in eastern Texas and northern through western Louisiana; habitat of preference is described to include pine-oak woodland assemblages (Werler and Dixon 2000). Dundee and Rossman (1989) reported the occurrences of this species in northern Louisiana in cultivated fields, farms, pasturelands, and abandoned suburban buildings. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species describes the current status of this species to be data deficient with most reports being outdated (Hammerson 2007).

	In Texas, occupies pine-oak woodlands (Werler and Dixon 2000); In Louisiana, this species is found in rural buildings and crop fields (Dundee and Rossman 1989).
